page.title: 14Tutbury, general information
page.content: In Tutbury the shops are a combination of the old and the new.Some old businesses have died out and others have taken their place like a video shop, a fish and chip shop and a Chinese take-away.Yet there are still places like the Cobblers shop which are old. At one time there were seventeen pubs in the village and less people but now there are more people and less pubs. No-one very famous has grown up in Tutbury although several good cricketers were born there. Many years ago there was a Tutbury prize Silver Band.Now there is a Tutbury Band which plays at local Fayres.The bands are very diffefent but were and are good to listen to Tutbury probably needs a sports centre more than anything else.
